Actions.Name: Chaos Cocoon
Actions.Description: The Chaos Demon summons a cocoon object in range 6.

Summons.Name: Cocoon
SummonEffects: The cocoon also is destroyed if a character collides with it.
When the Cocoon is destroyed, summon 2 natals in free adjacent spaces.

Actions.Name: Fatal Thaum
Actions.Mark: At the end of that character's turn, shoot a bolt of energy at that character, creating a blast 1 area effect centered on them. Deals [D] piercing to that character, destroys all created terrain in the area and shoves all other characters 1 away from that character. Then, end this mark.

Actions.Name: Flesh Warp
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 is torn into pieces and reassembled nearby. They take 1 piercing damage and are teleported 1
Actions.Effects: Increase teleport distance and damage by +1 for each time this ability was used this turn.

Actions.Name: Chaos Cocoon
Actions.Description: The Chaos Demon summons 3 cocoon objects in range 6.

Summons.Name: Cocoon
SummonEffects: The cocoon also is destroyed if a character collides with it.
When the Cocoon is destroyed, summon 2 natals in free adjacent spaces.
